item.title: Making Point system
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

can someone help me make a points system for my clan system. like when someone in the zammy clan kills someone in the guthix clan, the zammy team gets a point. im thinking somehthing like this.

if ((KillerID == isInZamorakClan) && (playerKilled == isInGuthixClan)) { zamorakPoints += 1; }

but i dont really know. can some experienced java person help?
